SELECT ROUND( CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN s.completion_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) END , 2) AS achievementRate FROM schedule s JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId} AND s.schedule_deadline >= #{startDateTime} AND s.schedule_deadline < #{endDateTime}
